name: Hyper Sentinel Fusion
storyline:
The relentless Alienoid Wars have thrust the galaxy to the brink of annihilation and humanity's desperation reaches its zenith. The last vestige of mankind resides on a hidden lunar outpost, where uncharted science and the indomitable human spirit combine in a final stand.

Welcome to Moonbase Alpha, the sanctuary of the Interdimensional Quantum Translocation Drive, known as Huxley-5. Dr Heimloch stands at the helm - in the shadow of this egotistical genius dangles the fate of Earth's very existence.

When Huxley-5 is triggered, the resulting time-flux detonation - guided by tenuous threads of science and courage - will propel the moonbase, and the lives of those within it back through the fabric of parallel universes, to the dawn of a new day to start the fight again.

A sense of expectation lingers, as ace pilot, Stella Novastorm flies the last surviving Hyper Sentinel – a super fighter from an almost forgotten time – on its inaugural test-flight over the long-dead remains of a seemingly inactive Alienoid Dreadnaught.
summary: An intense shoot-em-up + roguelite fusion. Pilot your fighter to destroy the defences of procedurally-generated space titans, then land, infiltrate and plunder the depths with your droid. Spend your bounty on epic upgrades & explore the moon base hub to interact with characters & unlock secrets.
